convertRules:
# have fun converting!
'\ndef |' -> 'Definition |\n\n: '

'\nprop |' -> '**Proposition |**: '
'\nlem |' -> '**Lemma |**: '
'\ntheo |' -> '**Theorem |**: '

'\nrem |' -> '**Remark**: |'
'\nobj |' -> '**Objection**: |'
'\nrpy |' -> '**Reply**: |'

# Selection Insert Rules
'"'  -> '"' + '"'
'<'  -> '<' + '>'
'~'  -> '~' + '~'
